item.title: Long Story Short
item.dc:creator: Lydia Davis
item.description: Somewhere in the files of General Mills is a letter from the very-short-story writer Lydia Davis.

item.title: The Landing
item.dc:creator: Lydia Davis
item.description: A new story by Lydia Davis. Can the pilot bring his terrified passengers safely down to earth?

item.title: Sister Godzilla
item.dc:creator: Daniel Solomon
item.description: The door banged shut, and then the children were alone with their sixth-grade teacher.

item.title: Five Short Stories By Lydia Davis
item.dc:creator: Lydia Davis
item.description: A friend of mine told me a sad story the other day about a neighbour of hers.

item.title: Matchimanito
item.dc:creator: Lydia Davis
item.description: We started dying before the snow, and, like the snow, we continued to fall.

item.title: The Two Davises and the Rug
item.dc:creator: Lydia Davis
item.description: They were both named Davis, but they were not married to each other and they were not related by blood.
